text: gRuhNIqyAt praqtya~jca#M ~Myaqj~jama#tigrAqhyA$H sa(gm) SRu#NIyurviSvaqjitiq sarva#pRuShThE grahItaqvyA# yaqj~jasya# savIryaqtvAya# praqjApa#tirdEqvEByO# yaqj~jAn vyAdi#Saqth sa priqyAstaqnUrapaq nya#dhattaq tada#tigrAqhyA# aBavaqn vita#nuqstasya# yaqj~ja ityA#huqrya-syA#tigrAqhyA# na gRuqhyantaq ityapya#gniShTOqmE gra#hItaqvyA# yaqj~jasya# satanuqtvAya# dEqvatAq vai sarvA$H saqdRuSI#rAsaqn tA na vyAqvRuta#-magacCaqn tE dEqvA- [  ] 31
